trans-unit.source: Provides access to the property values of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern" /> object using its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.TransformPattern.Current" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.TransformPattern.Cached" /> accessors.
trans-unit.target: Fornece acesso aos valores de propriedade de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern" /> usando os próprios acessadores <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.TransformPattern.Current" /> ou <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.TransformPattern.Cached" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the value of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que especifica se o valor de um elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the value is read-only; <see langword="false" /> if it can be modified.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o valor é somente leitura; <see langword="false" /> se ele pode ser modificado.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: A control should have its <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.IsEnabledProperty> set to `true` and its <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.IsReadOnlyProperty> set to `false` prior to the creation of a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> object.
trans-unit.target: Um controle deve ter sua <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.IsEnabledProperty> definido como `true` e sua <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.IsReadOnlyProperty> definida como `false` antes da criação de um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> objeto.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> that supports the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> control pattern has its value incremented or decremented by the control-specific <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.LargeChange%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo a seguir, uma <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> que oferece suporte a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> padrão de controle tem seu valor aumentada ou diminuída com o controle específico <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.LargeChange%2A> valor.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control-specific large-change value which is added to or subtracted from the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRangeValueProvider.Value" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor de grande alteração específica do controle que é adicionado ou subtraído da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRangeValueProvider.Value" />.

trans-unit.source: The large-change value or <see langword="null" /> if the element does not support <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.LargeChange" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor de grandes alterações ou <see langword="null" /> se não tiver suporte para o elemento <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.LargeChange" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é 0,0.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> that supports the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> control pattern has its value incremented or decremented by the control-specific <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.LargeChange%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo a seguir, uma <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> que oferece suporte a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> padrão de controle tem seu valor aumentada ou diminuída com o controle específico <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.LargeChange%2A> valor.

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum range value supported by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor de intervalo máximo aceito pelo elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The maximum value supported by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element or <see langword="null" /> if the element does not support <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Maximum" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor máximo com suporte a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento ou <see langword="null" /> se não tiver suporte para o elemento <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Maximum" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é 0,0.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> that supports the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> control pattern has its value set to the control-specific maximum value.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo a seguir, uma <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> que oferece suporte a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> padrão de controle tem o valor definido como o valor máximo do controle específico.

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum range value supported by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor de intervalo mínimo aceito pelo elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The minimum value supported by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element or <see langword="null" /> if the element does not support <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Minimum" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor mínimo com suporte a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento ou <see langword="null" /> se não tiver suporte para o elemento <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Minimum" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é 0,0.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> that supports the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> control pattern has its value set to the control-specific minimum value.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo a seguir, uma <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> que oferece suporte a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> padrão de controle tem o valor definido como o valor mínimo do controle específico.

trans-unit.source: Gets the small-change value, unique to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element, which is added to or subtracted from the elements <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Value" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor de pequena alteração, exclusivo para o elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)], que é adicionado ou subtraído da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Value" /> dos elementos.

trans-unit.source: The small-change value unique to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element or <see langword="null" /> if the element does not support <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.SmallChange" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor de pequena alteração exclusivo para o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento ou <see langword="null" /> se não tiver suporte para o elemento <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.SmallChange" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é 0,0.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> that supports the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> control pattern has its value incremented or decremented by the control-specific <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.SmallChange%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo a seguir, uma <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> que oferece suporte a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> padrão de controle tem seu valor aumentada ou diminuída com o controle específico <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.SmallChange%2A> valor.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current value of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor atual do elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The current value of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element or <see langword="null" /> if the element does not support <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Value" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor atual de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento ou <see langword="null" /> se o elemento não oferece suporte a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Value" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é 0,0.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> object obtained from a target control is passed into a function that retrieves the current <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> property values.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo a seguir, uma <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> objeto obtido de um controle de destino é passado para uma função que recupera atual <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> valores de propriedade.
